versions.changelog:
## Jellyfin Xtream for jellypig - Pure Upstream Logic

This release reverts all custom modifications and returns to Kevin's original upstream logic.

### Version Info
- **Version**: 0.7.2.9991 (upstream 0.7.2.0 + ashik-alpha0)
- **Name**: Jellyfin Xtream for jellypig
- **Purpose**: Testing with jellypig tvOS client fix

### Changes from Previous Test Builds
- âœ… Removed XtreamSeriesProvider (custom addition)
- âœ… Series episodes use `ContentType.Episode` (not Movie)
- âœ… Removed all custom ProviderIds
- âœ… Plugin code now 100% matches [Kevinjil/Jellyfin.Xtream](https://github.com/Kevinjil/Jellyfin.Xtream) upstream

### Why This Works
The bug fix is now in the jellypig tvOS client (removing `.program` from image loading logic), so the plugin no longer needs workarounds.

### Installation
Add repository: `https://ashikslab.github.io/Jellyfin.Xtream/repository.json`
